citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:45 a.m. on 16-
JUN-2022. Called contact information, waited 30 minutes at facility, spoke with facility representative who indicated
licensee unable to facilitate an inspection,
End Section
